roleset.name: figure out
roleset.note: ASCERTAIN-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. VN updated by Julia, 9/2010. Member of Vncls discover-84, ensure-99, promise-37.13. (from ascertain.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yutaka Kawashima also suggested that the Universe Development UndertakingGroup organize an [inspection team]-1 *PRO*-1 to thoroughly ascertain the reason whythe satellite could not enter geosynchronous orbit [*T*-15].
example.arg: the reason why the satellite could not enter geosynchronous orbit
